mapper.select: SELECT C.CT_NAME AS primary_cd, SUM(OD.O_COST) AS sales_p FROM TBL_PRODUCT P, TBL_ORDER_D OD,(SELECT C2.CT_NAME, C1.CT_CODE FROM TBL_CATEGORY C1, TBL_CATEGORY C2 WHERE c1.ct_p_code = c2.ct_code ) C WHERE P.P_NUM = OD.P_NUM AND P.S_CT_CODE = C.CT_CODE GROUP BY C.CT_NAME ORDER BY C.CT_NAME
